title: This Video Will Drive The BS Media Insane (Ep 1864)
description:
In this episode, I address the video clip that is going to drive the liberal media insane. I debunk the insane media narratives surrounding the hurricane response. Finally, we address the latest scandal surrounding the vaccine. 

News Picks:


The BS media narrative is already forming around the Hurricane. 

Are hurricanes getting “more intense”?

The US is 'slow-walking its way' into World War III.

Biden thanks Coast Guard rescuer for hurricane heroics days before firing over vaccine policy.



Biden tapping tax dollars to boost Dem registration, turnout, warn House GOP, voting watchdog.

The totalitarian left, and their censorship loving big tech friends, have an enemies list.


Stacey Abrams loses again.
